name: Hockey Referee Simulator
description:
Hockey Referee Simulator - second mobile game of the referee simulator series in which you will be playing as the referee!
Start your career in the lowest league and become legendary by participating in the final!

*** In-game real time simulation! ***

Hockey Referee Simulator will allow you to play key parts of the game!
The simulation works in real time, so every decision will affect further progress of the game!

** Improve your character **

Create your own character and achieve desired goals! Read news after each game, take various awards and improve your personal statistics!

* Dozens of clubs and national teams *

There are more than 50 different clubs in 6 regions and 12 national teams along with dozens of leagues and tournaments.
The game does not contain any ads or in-game purchases. All content is available right after purchase.
